function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Epidemics posing a future risk","Impact":"Potential widespread illness and disruption","Mitigation":"Developing pandemic-resilient housing designs","Technologies":"Innovative construction materials and methods","People":"Residents and communities","Owner":"Architects and urban planners"},{"Description":"Changes in lifestyle affecting use of homes","Impact":"Reduced comfort, convenience, and safety","Mitigation":"Creating flexible and adaptable home designs","Technologies":"Smart home technology and modular construction","People":"Homeowners and residents","Owner":"Real estate developers"},{"Description":"Shortcomings of cities in pandemic response","Impact":"Vulnerability to disease spread and resource strain","Mitigation":"City planning for disease resilience and sustainability","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure and green urban spaces","People":"City officials and urban planners","Owner":"Government and city administration"}]}
